column4: This CP command is driving me nuts! can anyone help, I've got a folder called Clearlooks in my home directory and I want to copy the whole folder to my /usr/share/amsn/skins folder, what do I type! the man and info pages were way too complicated :S
do I have to be in the folder with the Clearlooks folder for it to work?
where do I specify the name of the folder.
not if you give the full pathnames
ok will give it as hot
Sheesh, as simple as that eh :)
30 year old programs do that you know.
Not even a message to say its done :)
use -v if you want to see more
I'm going to have to use Linux for about 30 years before I get the hang of it.
My hatred of windoze is keeping me at it though.
I've only used it for ~20 years ;-)
Ha, roughly as long as I've been alive!
